properties.name: amazon.s3.bucket-name
properties.description: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket to use for storing or retrieving objects.

properties.name: amazon.s3.region
properties.description: The AWS region where the specified S3 bucket is hosted (e.g., us-east-1, eu-west-2).

properties.name: amazon.s3.access-key
properties.description: The AWS access key used to authenticate requests to Amazon S3.

properties.name: amazon.s3.secret-key
properties.description: The AWS secret key associated with the access key for authenticating requests to Amazon S3.

properties.name: security.jwt.access-ttl-ms
properties.description: The Time to Live for JWT Access Token after creation in Milliseconds.

properties.name: security.jwt.secret-key
properties.description: The JWT secret key used to sign and verify tokens.

properties.name: security.jwt.refresh-ttl-ms
properties.description: The Time to Live for JWT Refresh Token after creation in Milliseconds.
